{"name": "Focus Hope - Detroit West", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Focus Hope provides supplemental commodities to senior citizens 60+, with limited income.

Requirements:

* Persons 60 years & older
* Provide # of people in household
* Meet income guidelines
* Reside in Wayne, Oakland, Macomb, or Washtenaw counties

Home delivery may be arranged for eligible seniors who are homebound or disabled. If you need homebound delivery or have any questions, call 313-494-4980.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.focushope.edu/programs/food-for-seniors/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4002669, "longitude": -83.1207503}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 494-4600", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Completed application"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must be income-eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
